description: Nezuko, Zenitsu, and Rengoku fight against Enmu to protect the passengers. Meanwhile, Tanjiro and Inosuke discover the location of Enmu’s neck. They work in tandem to thwart Enmu’s Blood Demon Art and sever Enmu’s neck. The Mugen Train writhes in pain and derails. What will be the fate of the 200 or so passengers as well as Tanjiro and his friends?
